types:type.name: transaction-request
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type transaction_request = {| countryCode: String, deviceId: Array<String>, transactionStartDate: String, transactionEndDate: String, channelCode: Array<String>, subChannelCode: Array<String>, typeCode: Array<String>, code: Array<String>, actualId: Array<String>, collectionId: Array<String>, notified: Boolean, notifiedStartDate: String, notifiedEndDate: String, earlyValued: Boolean, earlyValuedStartDate: String, earlyValuedEndDate: String, fields: Array<String>, sort: Array<String>, limit: Number {"typeId": "int"}, offset: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"countryCode\\\":\\\"PT\\\",\\\"deviceId\\\":[\\\"PT083503783001A01\\\"],\\\"transactionStartDate\\\":\\\"2021-09-07T00:00:00+02:00\\\",\\\"transactionEndDate\\\":\\\"2021-09-07T23:59:59+02:00\\\",\\\"channelCode\\\":[\\\"ING\\\",\\\"DEB\\\"],\\\"subChannelCode\\\":[\\\"INGBIL\\\",\\\"DEB\\\"],\\\"typeCode\\\":[\\\"MAECIC\\\"],\\\"code\\\":[\\\"20210907134732_503783001A01_CASHIN_1\\\"],\\\"actualId\\\":[\\\"20210907134732_503783001A01_1\\\"],\\\"collectionId\\\":[\\\"503783001A01_1\\\"],\\\"notified\\\":true,\\\"notifiedStartDate\\\":\\\"2021-09-07T00:00:00+02:00\\\",\\\"notifiedEndDate\\\":\\\"2021-09-07T23:59:59+02:00\\\",\\\"earlyValued\\\":true,\\\"earlyValuedStartDate\\\":\\\"2021-09-07T00:00:00+02:00\\\",\\\"earlyValuedEndDate\\\":\\\"2021-09-07T23:59:59+02:00\\\",\\\"fields\\\":[\\\"branchCode\\\",\\\"branchUniqueCode\\\",\\\"branchName\\\",\\\"entityCode\\\",\\\"entityUniqueCode\\\",\\\"entityName\\\",\\\"centerCode\\\",\\\"centerUniqueCode\\\",\\\"centerName\\\",\\\"servicePointCode\\\",\\\"servicePointUniqueCode\\\",\\\"servicePointName\\\",\\\"channelCode\\\",\\\"channelName\\\",\\\"subChannelCode\\\",\\\"subChannelName\\\",\\\"accountingDate\\\",\\\"creationDate\\\",\\\"typeCode\\\",\\\"typeName\\\",\\\"actualId\\\",\\\"collectionId\\\",\\\"notified\\\",\\\"notifiedDate\\\",\\\"earlyValued\\\",\\\"earlyValuedDate\\\",\\\"denominations\\\",\\\"extraDatas\\\"],\\\"sort\\\":[\\\"branchCode\\\",\\\"servicePointCode\\\",\\\"notified\\\",\\\"earlyValued\\\"],\\\"limit\\\":1000,\\\"offset\\\":1}"}
